Title: Unbroken
Overview: A chronicle of the life of Louis Zamperini, an Olympic runner who was taken prisoner by Japanese forces during World War II.
Keywords: world war ii, prisoners of war, biography, sport, war, athlete, woman director, olympic athlete
production_companies: Legendary Pictures, 3 Arts Entertainment, Jolie Pas
Cast: Jack O'Connell, Domhnall Gleeson, Garrett Hedlund
